content.text:
Express the note value of <image 1> with three dotted notes

A. <image 2>
B. <image 3>
C. <image 4>
D. <image 5>

To express the note value of the single dotted note in image 1 with three dotted notes, we need to understand the time value and how it is represented in music notation.

- A single dotted note is equivalent to three quarter notes (or three quarter notes in a measure of 4/4 time.
- Three quarter notes in a measure of 4/4 time would be equivalent to one whole note.

Therefore, the correct representation of the note value of the single dotted note with three dotted notes would be:

A. <image 2>

This is because image 2 shows three quarter notes, which is equivalent to the value of the single dotted note.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
